TuningRoot.Instance:
<TunableTuple name="track_range" class="TunableInterval" display="Track Range" description="The relationship track must > lower_bound and <= upper_bound for the operation to apply." group="General">
<TunableVariant type="None" name="subtext" class="TunableLocalizedStringFactoryVariant" default="single" display="Subtext" description="If tuned, this text will display below the button.
